author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Ecal geometry configuration and its test script

This PR is based on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26371

#### PR validation:

```
cmsRun Geometry/EcalAlgo/test/python/testEcalGeometry.py
```
The error is due to a missing implementation of a **ecal:DDEcalBarrelNewAlgo** algorithm and should be ignored for now:
```
DD4CMS                 +++ Start executing algorithm DDCMS_ecal_DDEcalBarrelNewAlgo....
DD4CMS           ERROR ++ FAILED  NOT ADDING SUBDETECTOR 00000000 = ecal:DDEcalBarrelNewAlgo
```

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

no back port is needed
title: DD4hep: Ecal Geometry Description
